subject: Fixing ant xml output for 4.0 release
msgSnippet: Hey guys, Is it possible to get the ant xml output fixed for junit 4.0 s release. Right now, it outputs:
messageBody:
Hey guys,

Is it possible to get the ant xml output fixed for junit 4.0's
release. Right now, it outputs:


<testcase classname="junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade"
name="unknown" time="0.02"></testcase>
<testcase classname="junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade"
name="unknown" time="0.0030"></testcase>
<testcase classname="junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade"
name="unknown" time="0.0060"></testcase>
<testcase classname="junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade"
name="unknown" time="0.026"></testcase>
<testcase classname="junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade"
name="unknown" time="0.139"></testcase>
<testcase classname="junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade"
name="unknown" time="0.0030"></testcase>

Rather than actual classes and names, as mentioned in my previous
emails. This is a blocker for anyone trying to run junit tests with ant.

(It'd also be nice sugar to remove the need for

public static junit.framework.Test suite() {
return new JUnit4TestAdapter(JUnitCoreTest.class);
}

but that's just extra sugar)

-- Ben
